<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Oozemorph Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2185) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from The Slithering</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Slithering](/Sources.aspx?ID=41) pg. 59</row>

**Archetype** [Oozemorph](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=84)

</column>

---

You are plagued by sporadic anatomical rearrangements, which grant you insights into other creatures with unusual anatomies. You become trained in [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) and [Ooze Lore](/Traits.aspx?ID=122); if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to Reflex saves to avoid being [Engulfed](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=14) by creatures, and to checks to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) after being Engulfed.

 As you develop more abilities based on your amorphous affliction, you become increasingly off-putting to mundane creatures. You take a penalty to [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) checks against [animals](/Traits.aspx?ID=9) and [humanoids](/Traits.aspx?ID=91). This penalty is equal to your number of class feats from the oozemorph archetype, to a maximum of –4 for four or more feats.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the oozemorph archetype.

<title level="2">Oozemorph Dedication leads to...</title>
[Disturbing Defense](/Feats.aspx?ID=2186), [Hideous Ululation](/Feats.aspx?ID=2187), [Ooze Empathy](/Feats.aspx?ID=2189), [Uncanny Suction](/Feats.aspx?ID=2191), [Vacate Vision](/Feats.aspx?ID=2188)
